May 14, 1955 D West of England Area (Championship Section)
West of England Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West Of England Area west-of-england-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) None West of England
Championship
The Severn Suite
Civic Hall, Exeter 6 bands competed.
Camborne were barred from the qualifying contest after a hat-trick, receiving automatic qualification to the final.
